features.name: Adaptable
features.description: You can adjust quickly to new situations and change course when needed.

features.name: Stoneborn
features.description: You shrug off exhaustion; reduce stress from physical harm by 1 once per rest.

features.name: Keen Senses
features.description: Gain +1 to notice hidden details in the wild.

features.name: Relentless
features.description: Once per rest, when you would fall, stay at 1 HP.

features.name: Scrap Savvy
features.description: You can improvise tools; gain +1 on quick fixes.

features.name: Glimmerwing
features.description: You can hover briefly and shed faint light.

features.name: Noble Bearing
features.description: In formal settings, gain +1 to social rolls.

features.name: Well-Read
features.description: Gain advantage on rolls about the history, culture, or politics of notable people or places.

features.name: Dedicated
features.description: Write three sayings or values from your upbringing. Once per rest, when you describe acting by one, you may roll a d20 as your Hope Die.

features.name: Steady
features.description: Gain advantage on rolls to cross dangerous cliffs or ledges, navigate harsh terrain, or use survival know-how.

features.name: Saltwise
features.description: You are at home on the water; gain +1 to sailing or swimming rolls.

features.name: Scoundrel
features.description: Gain advantage on rolls to deal with criminals, spot lies, or find a safe place to hide.

features.name: Low-Light Living
features.description: In dim light or heavy shadow, gain advantage on rolls to hide, investigate, or notice details there.

features.name: Nomadic Pack
features.description: Add a Nomadic Pack to your inventory. Once per session, spend a Hope to pull a useful mundane item from it; work with the GM to choose it.

features.name: Trailwise
features.description: You move quietly through wild terrain; gain +1 to stealth outdoors.
